ingredients.ingredient: 4 cream-filled sponge snack cakes (such as Twinkies™)
4 (4 inch) squirts of pressurized canned cheese (such as Easy Cheese™)

cookingTips: Cook hot dogs until heated through before assembling
For easier handling, slice Twinkies lengthwise to create a boat shape
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a novelty sandwich combining sweet and savory elements. How would you balance the flavors?
